00028 #ifndef _BUFFER_H_
00029 #define _BUFFER_H_
00030 
00031 #include <stdint.h>
00032 #include <vector>
00033 
00034 class Buffer
00035 {
00036 public:
00037 
00044         Buffer(uint8_t* buffer, uint32_t size);
00045 
00049         virtual ~Buffer();
00050 
00056         uint32_t size();
00057 
00058         /*
00059          * Methods to read values from buffer. Each method increases the position
00060          * according to the data size.
00061          *
00062          * If you pass an index, from that moment the new position for the buffer
00063          * will be that index.
00064          */
00065 
00072         int8_t getChar();
00082         int8_t getChar(uint32_t index);
00083 
00090         uint8_t getUChar();
00100         uint8_t getUChar(uint32_t index);
00101 
00108         int16_t getShort();
00118         int16_t getShort(uint32_t index);
00119 
00126         uint16_t getUShort();
00136         uint16_t getUShort(uint32_t index);
00137 
00144         int32_t getInt();
00154         int32_t getInt(uint32_t index);
00155 
00162         uint32_t getUInt();
00172         uint32_t getUInt(uint32_t index);
00173 
00180         float getFloat();
00190         float getFloat(uint32_t index);
00191 
00198         double getDouble();
00208         double getDouble(uint32_t index);
00209 
00216         long getLong();
00226         long getLong(uint32_t index);
00227 
00234         unsigned long getULong();
00244         unsigned long getULong(uint32_t index);
00245 
00252         int64_t getLongLong();
00253 
00263         int64_t getLongLong(uint32_t index);
00264 
00272         uint64_t getULongLong();
00282         uint64_t getULongLong(uint32_t index);
00283 
00284 
00285 private:
00286         template <typename T> T read()
00287         {
00288                 return read<T>(position_);
00289         }
00290 
00291         template <typename T> T read(uint32_t pos)
00292         {
00293                 if ( ( pos + sizeof(T) ) <= buffer_.size() )
00294                 {
00295                         T data = *reinterpret_cast<T*>(&buffer_[pos]);
00296                         position_ = pos + sizeof(T);
00297                         return data;
00298                 }
00299 
00300                 return 0;
00301         }
00302 
00306         std::vector<uint8_t> buffer_;
00307 
00311         uint32_t position_;
00312 
00313 
00317         uint32_t size_;
00318 };
